CustomField.description: Converts Equipment and Materials Value field to text for LOA pull-in.
CustomField.formula: IF( Equipment_and_Materials_Value__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Equipment_and_Materials_Value__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Equipment_and_Materials_Value__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Equipment_and_Materials_Value__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Equipment_and_Materials_Value__c)), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Equipment_and_Materials_Value__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Equipment_and_Materials_Value__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Equipment_and_Materials_Value__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) )
CustomField.label: Equipment and Materials Value Text
